oai_dc:dc.dc:title: Joseph Delaney seated in front of sidewalk art exhibit
oai_dc:dc.dc:subject: Performing Identity
Artists
African American artists
oai_dc:dc.dc:coverage: United States -- New York (State) -- New York
oai_dc:dc.dc:description: Delaney in suit and hat, seated on a wooden crate in front of a plank fence on which works of art have been installed.
This scene might be of Washington Square, New York City, where Joseph Delaney lived for many years.
